message: If she really believed that she wouldn't take sponsorship money from corporations, they could influence her to adjust the outcome of a fight. Money is the life-blood of politics, you can't take it out and have anything but a monarchy/dictatorship. Whether it is from a group of people or one individual, it doesn't matter, money only reveals what is already there. For instance, an old-man asks a pretty young girl, """"Would you sleep with me for $10 million?"""" She replied, """"Uh, yes."""" He then asks, """"Would you sleep with me for $10?"""" She replies, """"I'm not that kind of girl."""" Says the old-man, """"Oh, we've already established what kind of girl you are, now we're just negotiating a price.""""
